name: Aries
description: A spring constellation that represents the image of a sheep with two horns. It is easily observable in the spring evening sky.

name: Taurus
description: A winter constellation that is centered around two of its brightest stars, Aldebaran and Iota Tauri. It resembles a horn and can be seen in the winter night sky.

name: Gemini
description: A winter constellation that resembles two brothers, and it contains the brightest stars along with the constellation Cancer located right next to it.

name: Cancer
description: A summer constellation that resembles a crab and contains the brightest stars along with Gemini. It can be seen in the summer night sky.

name: Leo
description: A summer constellation that resembles a lion and is one of the most prominent constellations in the night sky. It can be seen in the summer night sky.

name: Virgo
description: A spring constellation that resembles a virgin and has many bright stars, including the brightest stars among the constellations. It can be seen in the spring evening sky.

name: Libra
description: An autumn constellation that resembles a scale, and it can be seen mainly in autumn.

name: Scorpio
description: A summer constellation that resembles a scorpion and is one of the most prominent constellations in the night sky. It can be seen in the summer night sky.

name: Sagittarius
description: A summer constellation that resembles an archer and contains many bright stars associated with the Milky Way. It can be seen in the summer night sky.

name: Capricorn
description: A winter constellation that resembles a goat and can be observed in the night sky in winter.

name: Aquarius
description: A winter constellation that resembles a water bearer, and there are many meteor showers in this constellation. It can be seen in the winter night sky.

name: Pisces
description: A winter constellation that resembles a fish and is represented by two fish swimming. It can be seen in the winter night sky.
